urd-wl-86-174276-11370252-post1__6
he added terrorists are using new techniques and the most modern communication systems we will have to heighten security on line of control as well from which intrusions made said terrorism not be tolerated under any conditions this is our policy further that latest telecommunication they increase along where cross border activities take place according him in form would accepted was their were should intensity at incursions beef up stop infiltration can cost continued advanced equipment also increased so these things could stopped stated shall never by indian government more rigorous over intrusion takes spared case step forces there used state controlling infiltrating adding vigilant took claims modernized forms asserts gear match opponents emphasizes means
He added, "Terrorists are using new techniques and the most modern communication systems. We will have to heighten security on the Line of Control as well, from which intrusions are made." He said, "Terrorism will not be tolerated under any conditions; this is our policy."
he added terrorists are using new techniques and the most modern communication systems we will have to heighten security on the line of control as well from which intrusions are made he said terrorism will not be tolerated under any conditions this is our policy
